bearerHelp.name: Where do I get an API Key?

saveHistory.name: Save conversation history
saveHistory.description: If turned off every Query will be it's own conversation and won't be related to the previous chat history. You can also view your conversation history with §b/gpt history §fand clear it with §b/gpt clear§f!

messages.noKey: You have to provide a valid OpenAI API Key!
messages.noQuery: You have to enter the text to send to ChatGPT!
messages.alreadyEmptyHistory: The conversation history is already empty!
messages.requestError: An error ocurred with the request to OpenAI!
messages.invalidBearer: You didn't provide an API key. You can obtain an API key from §bhttps://platform.openai.com/account/api-keys§c.
messages.historyCleared: The conversation history was successfully cleared!
